programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep25
programme.desc: Rupert and the Missing Music - Rupert asks Ping Pong to do some magic to make their band instruments play better but the spell goes wrong. The colourful musical notes fly away, leaving them with instruments that make no sound.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep26
programme.desc: Rupert and the Weather Machine - When it starts raining sausages in Nutwood Rupert and friends fly up to the Cloud Shepherd's home to find out what has happened to the weather machine.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep27
programme.desc: Rupert and the Hilarious Hiccups - Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda are playing in the forest when Freddy and Freda spot a colourful box dropped by a travelling salesman. They open it expecting to find sandwiches or even a cake but get more than they expected when hiccups jump out of the box instead. They try to run away from the hiccups but crash into the travelling salesman and his colourful cart and upset a box of yawns and a box of giggling noises too. Rupert, Bill, Freddy and Freda discover that the noises are very infectious and come up with a plan to help the travelling salesman capture the naughty noises again. Greedy Freddy and Freda still haven't learnt their lesson. They find the remainder of the Elf's lunch and guzzle it all up only to catch the hiccups for real and learn that they need to be less greedy in future.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep28
programme.desc: Rupert and the Snowglobe - When Rupert, Bill and Ping-Pong arrive at the beach one sunny day they are amazed to find a small snowstorm raging over one distinct area. Jack Frost emerges and explains that he has come early this year because he wants to catch some sun. He shows them the snowglobe he uses to control the icy storm. The friends play in the snow unaware that Ming has got hold of the snowglobe and is shaking it up, causing the storm to grow out of control....

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep25
programme.desc: What's The Grumbly Rumbly Noise? - Jess sets out to re-assure his frightened friends by working out what the noise is in the sky that's so loud.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep26
programme.desc: When Will The Snow Come? - Jess is hoping that soon it will snow so that they can make snow kittens and play in the snow like they did last year. First though he has to work out what the weather would have to be like for the snow to come..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep27
programme.desc: What Do We Need To Grow Beans? - Jess and the friends want to grow something for their kind friend Mimi who's always growing special things for them. They start with a bean and work out how important sunlight and water are too, by trial and error.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep154
programme.desc: No Panic ! - Christopher needs to warn Froga to protect her strawberries since he ears a thunderstorm coming! It turns out, the noise of thunder comes from Bubu's new invention: the weather machine!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep156
programme.desc: Bubu's Portrait - Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a surprise gift. As she is missing a colour, she leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher arrives and finds the abandoned painting, he decides to take it to Bubu's.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep316
programme.desc: Feelin' Filipino - Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep401
programme.desc: Pups Save a Blimp / Pups Save a Chili Cook-Out - Capn' Turbot's weather blimp is taken by Mayor Humdinger who plans ot use it to change the weather in Foggy Bottom. // Mr. Porter's stove explodes right before the Chilli cook-off.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S05 Ep515
programme.desc: Rocky Saves Himself - Rocky must rescue himself when he has been stranded on an Island full of trash by Humdinger.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Paddington Runs the Caf / Paddington Makes a Film - Paddington says he will watch the cafe, so Matteo can play with Jonathan and Judy in the park. // Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a film camera to record his adventures in Windsor Gardens to send to Aunt Lucy in the retired home for Bears in Lima.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Guacamole - Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep95
programme.desc: Tiddlytubby Party - Tinky Winky finds a party invitation and shows it to Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. The invitation takes flight and the Teletubbies follow it to find a Tiddlytubbies' party.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep20
programme.desc: Snow - Dee encourages a friend to say `snow', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of snow, cold snow, falling snow, twinkly snow and yummy snow.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Phoebe's Hotel - As it's rainy, Phoebe decides to play hotel - will the game go as well as she hopes?

programme.desc: Messy-power - Hey, who turned out the lights? Messy goes to OKIDO and finds out electricity can lead to music, lights and disco dancing!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Pea Soup - Monty thinks Gran's soup might be the tastiest ever, but he wonders how you can know if something is the best in the world.

programme.desc: The Cardboard Box Badge - The dog gets a delivery that arrives in a big box and the squirrels discover that cardboard can be very interesting.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Kid Plays in the Picture / Achy Breaky Art - Carl's love for toys gets him caught up in a whirlwind toy review career. // Frida's art gets a bad review, the kids try to stage a new auction to lift her spirits.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Bunny the Barbarian - Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep244
programme.desc: The Krusty Slammer - Mr. Krabs turns the Krusty Krab into a jailhouse after Plankton breaks the law, but crime only pays for so long.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep136
programme.desc: A Day Without Tears / Summer Job - Squidward bets SpongeBob he can't go a day without crying. // Mrs. Puff has to work through her summer break at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Squisery / Game Night - Patrick and Squidward must survive together in the woods after Squidward twists all of his ankles. // The adults sneak away to play a board game, but they have to hide from one camper in particular.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep625
programme.desc: Fashion No Show / Doom Service - Leni and Carlota's working styles clash when they are both interning for a famous fashion designer, Mariella Moss. // The Louds book a stay at an all-inclusive resort, only to find the vacation is not what they imagined.

programme.title: The Really Loud House S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Banana Split Decision - It's parent teacher conference night and the Loud parents find themselves endlessly running around from class to class. Lincoln has his heart set on the Banana Split that their parents have promised if the Loud kids get more good reviews than bad.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Secret Legacy Pt. 1 - Robby has trouble adjusting after their family's big move to the rural town of Witwicky, until he and his sister, Mo, discover the first-ever Earthborn Transformers.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Backpay Payback / House Hunting - Granny Tentacles helps Squidward collect his paper delivery money from Cecil. // The Star family house runs away from home.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep245
programme.desc: Gary's Got Legs / King Plankton - Gary is given a set of limbs to keep up with SpongeBob, but soon makes his owner look sluggish by comparison. // Plankton practices ruling the world by shrinking himself down and declaring himself king of SpongeBob's aquarium.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep234
programme.desc: Patnocchio - Plankton tells Patrick he's his conscience so he can convince the wooden-headed star to steal him a Krabby Patty.

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Out of Step / Pyramid Scheme - Afraid to be embarrassed at a dance-off, Draculaura secretly gives her dance partner, Clawd, enchanted shoes. // Cleo wants the lead role for the school play and raids her family's ancient tomb for a perfect, superior costume.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Dial 'M' for Mustard - Ronnie Anne and her friends uncover a town mystery: what happened to Bruno's hot dog cart?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Squawk in the Name of Love / Date with Destiny - Sergio enlists Adelaide's help to become a gentleman in order to win Priscilla back! // Rosa hears an Ernesto Estrella prediction that Maria and Arturo could get back together - could it be true?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Bros in the Band / For the Record - Bobby's dream of playing in a band might finally come true, but can he hang with Par's punk pals? // Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the The Italian Dream Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC274OliveiravsGaethje

programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep14
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep10
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Yusuff vs. Barboza
programme.desc: Prelims - An elite featherweight talent readying his assault on the Top 10 at 145 pounds, Sodiq Yusuff has one more roadblock in his way in the form of feared striker Edson Barboza, who he meets in the October 14 main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

Capable of ending a fight with one punch, kick, elbow or knee, Brazils Barboza is coming off a memorable knockout of Billy Quarantillo in April, and he has similar plans for Yusuff, whose back-to-back wins over Alex Caceres and Don Shainis have him in prime form.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep901UFC256FigueiredovsMoreno1

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC273VolkanovskivsTheKoreanZombie
programme.desc: UFC 273 featured UFC featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski carve out his legacy as one of the best ever as he faces The Korean Zombie. Plus, a heated rivalry in the co-main event as Aljamain Sterling and Petr Yan rematch for the undisputed bantamweight title. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep905AdesanyavsVettori2
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the The Italian Dream Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep16
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds
